sentences.en: A musical based on Obama's memoir is set to open.
sentences.cn: 基于奥巴马自传改编的音乐剧正要上演.

sentences.en: Dancing away an anxious mind: a memoir about overcoming panic disorder.
sentences.cn: 跳舞以外的焦急: 克服恐慌症的回忆录.

sentences.en: George W. Bush—soon, like so many American workers, to have lots of time on his hands—may soon be shopping a memoir, and for good reason.
sentences.cn: 布什不久就会像许多美国工人那样拥有相当多的闲暇时光，他可能会用一个极好的理由购买一本实录。

sentences.en: He has just published a memoir in honour of his captain.
sentences.cn: 他刚刚出了一本传记来纪念他的队长。

sentences.en: His antobiography, or memoir, is ready for publication.
sentences.cn: 他的自传, 也就是回忆录, 即可出版了.

sentences.en: I had requested the statesman to autograph my copy of his latest memoir.
sentences.cn: 我请求这位政治家为我的一本李光耀回忆录下册签名.

sentences.en: In 1858 he sent me a memoir on this subject.
sentences.cn: 他于1858年,曾寄给我关于本题的一篇论文.

sentences.en: In her memoir, the actress wrote about the bittersweet memories of her first love.
sentences.cn: 在那个女演员的自传中, 她写到了自己苦乐掺半的初恋.

sentences.en: In his memoir, Stephen King shows that he knows the ropes when it comes to storytelling.
sentences.cn: 在他的回忆录中, 史蒂芬&8226;金表示他很懂讲故事的诀窍.

sentences.en: In the celebrity memoir that sees in us, have mostly similar, mad but correct age job.
sentences.cn: 在我们看到的名人回忆录中, 大多有类似的 、 疯狂但是正确的陈年旧事.

sentences.en: Lady Thatcher had just published her memoirs.
sentences.cn: 撒切尔夫人刚刚出版了她的回忆录。

sentences.en: She wrote a memoir of her stay in France.
sentences.cn: 她写了一篇旅法记事录.

sentences.en: That volcanologist was busying with memoir after his retirement.
sentences.cn: 自从退休以后,那位火山学家一直忙于撰写回忆录.

sentences.en: The actress wrote a notorious tell - all memoir.
sentences.cn: 那位女演员写了一本声名狼藉的告白回忆录.
老年人则是一本回忆录.

sentences.en: The memoir eloquent chronicle of Lee Kuan Yew's extensive experiences in statecraft, politics and international diplomacy.
sentences.cn: 回忆录对李光耀的治国才能 、 政治和国际外交的丰富经验有生动流畅的记载.

sentences.en: The students decided to write a memoir to commemorate their teacher.
sentences.cn: 为了纪念恩师,同学们打算撰写一部回忆录.

words.tran_cn: 回忆录；研究报告；自传；实录

trans.tran_en: a book by someone important and famous in which they write about their life and experiences
